page.title: 06Farm Facts And Figures (1)
page.content: {Composition of the main farm : ====================================== CROPS = 954.0 ) GRASSLAND = 638.8 ) TOTAL AREA = WOODLAND = 168.3 ) 1794.1 Hectares OTHER = 33.0 ) ====================================== WHEAT = 514.0 ) BARLEY(WINTER) = 186.5 ) CROPS = BARLEY(SPRING) = 237.0 ) 954.0 TURNIPS = 8.5 ) Hectares KALE,CABBAGE = 8.0 ) ====================================== TRACTORS = 25 COMBINE HARVESTERS = 2 FURROW PLOUGHS = 7 HARROWS = 12 ROLLERS = 8 VEHICLES = 4 HEDGE CUTTERS = 1 ====================================== {LIVESTOCK INFORMATION ON THE NEXT PAGE
